name: ArmorStandEntityHelper
description: The ArmorStandEntityHelper class provides specialized methods for interacting with armor stand entities in Minecraft.
overview:
The ArmorStandEntityHelper class provides specialized methods for interacting with armor stand entities in Minecraft. Armor stands are decorative entities that can be customized with different poses, visibility settings, and equipment. This helper allows you to query and manipulate various properties of armor stands including their pose, visibility, physical characteristics, and limb rotations.

This class inherits all methods from LivingEntityHelper and EntityHelper, providing access to standard entity operations like positioning, health tracking, and world interaction, in addition to armor stand-specific functionality.

methods.name: isVisible
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is visible.

methods.name: isSmall
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is small. Small armor stands have reduced collision boxes.

methods.name: hasArms
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand has arms.

methods.name: hasBasePlate
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand has a base plate.

methods.name: isMarker
methods.description: Checks if the armor stand is a marker. Marker armor stands have no hitbox and cannot be interacted with.

methods.name: getHeadRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's head. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.

methods.name: getBodyRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's body. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.

methods.name: getLeftArmRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's left arm. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.

methods.name: getRightArmRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's right arm. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.

methods.name: getLeftLegRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's left leg. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.

methods.name: getRightLegRotation
methods.description: Gets the rotation of the armor stand's right leg. Returns an array of [yaw, pitch, roll] in degrees.
